headline.print_headline: White Sox LHP Quintana Hit in Shin by Line Drive
headline.main: White Sox LHP Quintana Hit in Shin by Line Drive

docs.snippet: White Sox pitcher Jose Quintana was hit in the shin by a line drive Saturday and removed from Chicago's 6-4 loss to an Arizona Diamondbacks split squad after just two batters....
docs.lead_paragraph: White Sox pitcher Jose Quintana was hit in the shin by a line drive Saturday and removed from Chicago's 6-4 loss to an Arizona Diamondbacks split squad after just two batters.

headline.print_headline: Sheriff Names Snowmobiler Killed in Utah Avalanche
headline.main: Sheriff Names Snowmobiler Killed in Utah Avalanche

docs.snippet: Sheriff's officials in Utah have released the name of the snowmobiler who died after he was buried by an avalanche....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sheriff's officials in Utah have released the name of the snowmobiler who died after he was buried by an avalanche.

headline.print_headline: No. 23 Iowa Tops Ohio St. 77-73 in Big Ten Semis
headline.main: No. 23 Iowa Tops Ohio St. 77-73 in Big Ten Semis

docs.snippet: Theairra Taylor scored 21 points and made a go-ahead layup with 1:32 left as fifth-seeded and No. 23-ranked Iowa held on for a 77-73 win over eighth-seeded Ohio State on Saturday in the semifinals of the Big Ten tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: Theairra Taylor scored 21 points and made a go-ahead layup with 1:32 left as fifth-seeded and No. 23-ranked Iowa held on for a 77-73 win over eighth-seeded Ohio State on Saturday in the semifinals of the Big Ten tournament.

docs.snippet: The Oregon Ducks opened the regular season with a 13-game winning streak. They closed it with seven straight victories....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Oregon Ducks opened the regular season with a 13-game winning streak. They closed it with seven straight victories.

headline.print_headline: Anderson Goes 3 Innings, Rockies Beat A's 5-4
headline.main: Anderson Goes 3 Innings, Rockies Beat A's 5-4

docs.snippet: Brett Anderson pitched three positive innings in his first start against his former team on Saturday, helping the Colorado Rockies to a 5-4 victory over the Oakland Athletics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brett Anderson pitched three positive innings in his first start against his former team on Saturday, helping the Colorado Rockies to a 5-4 victory over the Oakland Athletics.

headline.print_headline: Thousands of Bees Attack Woman in California
headline.main: Thousands of Bees Attack Woman in California

docs.snippet: A 71-year-old woman is believed to have suffered about 1,000 stings in Southern California after being attacked by a swarm of killer bees that covered her entire body....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 71-year-old woman is believed to have suffered about 1,000 stings in Southern California after being attacked by a swarm of killer bees that covered her entire body.

headline.sub: Libya threatens to bomb North Korean tanker if it ships oil from rebel port
headline.main: Libya threatens to bomb North Korean tanker if it ships oil from rebel port

docs.snippet: Libya threatens to bomb a North Korean-flagged tanker if it tries to ship oil from a rebel-controlled port, in a major escalation of a standoff over the country's petroleum wealth. Mana Rabiee reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Libya threatens to bomb a North Korean-flagged tanker if it tries to ship oil from a rebel-controlled port, in a major escalation of a standoff over the country's petroleum wealth. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.print_headline: Kerry, Cruz and Crist Poke Fun at Gridiron Dinner
headline.main: Kerry, Cruz and Crist Poke Fun at Gridiron Dinner

docs.snippet: Politicians poked fun at adversaries and themselves Saturday night at the annual Gridiron dinner, a gathering of journalists and public figures....
docs.lead_paragraph: Politicians poked fun at adversaries and themselves Saturday night at the annual Gridiron dinner, a gathering of journalists and public figures.

docs.snippet: A punny offering from Brendan Emmett Quigley....
